ygData.subject: RE: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that you can do this. FYI - rumor and hearsay - not actually see this work. Sylly p.s. 550 gold coins? Bah - take this plat and like it! ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that you can do this. FYI - rumor and hearsay - not actually
see this work.

Sylly

p.s. 550 gold coins? Bah - take this plat and like it!


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 1:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent breastplate quest
peculiarity

On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> It is a bug of a sort. Here is what happens: Lets say a
quest requires 3

Hmm, does this mean my cleric friend (who picked up a gypsy
lute when I wasn't there) could give the lute to the NPC,
and
I could give the NPC the carapace and ruby lambent, and I
would get the breastplate?
